reviews.text:
Very powerful message,  not sugar coated straight from Word of God,  people may not like cause it is not going according them, going it points where they are wrong,  so they can correct them.
If you want to be in heaven hear it and follow try to change yourself. Read your Bible , understand it, that says same thing.
Just not gone according to you don't blame.
True Word of God,  it shows you what you are and wants to change you inside out,  same like Him loving caring not blaming or hating
I like this church I didn't go to this place I am an online viewer as I can't go to church, after so long found this since then I like this for nearly 3 years..
To God be the Glory

It has become a church that is prideful, legalistic, quick to judge and cynical. It was a shocking experience. There is a strong vibe of superiority complex in this place of worship, as if they are the only few exclusive churches remaining that is chosen for salvation.

It seems that they believe that their faith surpass many other churches with pride, and they equate legalism to obedience, uncompromising and unwavering faith.

All my 3 children graduated from this Kindergarten. The teachers there are very caring and yet firm. They are loving and patient. I really like the singing time where my children learn many many songs. My children enjoyed going to school to learn. Reasonable amount of homework is given each week at k1 and k2 level. There are also after school enrichment activities like art, Chinese kidstart, abacus that you can consider signing your child up for.
Thank God for the faithful preaching by this church pastor Rev Quek which I've learned so much from him.
This Bible Presbyterian church was founded by the late Dr Tow Siang Hua. Under his shepherding, many other churches were planted in the early days of the church's history.
